{{Wired embedded system |brand=Edgewater Networks |model=EdgeMarc 200 |revision=AE2 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Runtop |manuf_model=GVA224A |manuf_rev=Rev VV |availability=EoL |est_release_date=08/2009 |fcc_id=NKRCMA |ic_id=5318A-200 |type=router, dsl modem, analog phone gateway |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Infineon |cpu1_model=PSB 50505;Infineon PSB 50505 V1.3; |cpu1_cspeed=235 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F128J3D75 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P3V56S40ETP-G6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, J1 |serial=yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (9600 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996M |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Extended PCI Arbiter;ITE;IT8208M;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Zywyn;ZT3243;;1; ,,, I2C Real Time Clock;Intersil;ISL12026;;1;,,, 3.3V Zero Delay Buffer;Cypress;CY2305S;;1;,,, Phone Line Monitor SOIC;IXYS;CPC5710N;;1;,,, Phone Line Interface SOIC;IXYS;CPC5622A;;1;,,, Voice over IP Processor for CPE;Infineon;PEB 3332;;2;,,, 5A Adjustable LDO Linear Regulator;Niko-Sem;L1084;;2;,,, 3A, 28V, 1.4MHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2365DN;;1;,,, High Voltage Ringing SLIC Protector;Bourns;TISP61089B;;2;,,, Octal Bus Transceiver w/ 3-State Output;NXP;74LVC244A;;1;,,, Ringing SLIC with Integrated DC/DC Converter;Infineon;PEF 4268T;;2;,,, Low-Power, Low-Offset Voltage Dual Comparator;TI;LM393;;3;,,, Low Voltage Quad 2-Input NAND Gate;Fairchild;74LCX00;;1;,,, Low-Power Dual Voltage Comparator;STMicro;LM2903;;1;,,, Low Voltage Hex Inverter;Fairchild;74LCX04;;1;,,, Quad 2-Input OR Gate;NXP;74LVC32A;;1; |flags=FXS, ADSL2+, VoIP, SIP, RTC w/ battery |stock_boot=U-Boot;2.0.18;E1664; |stock_os=Linux;2.4.20;3.0.03-M; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=default |oui_eth=00:03:6D }} {{TagLine|Converged Networking Router}} :''ADSL Router with VoIP'' • [ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/EdgeMarc/200/200AE2_QuickStartGuide.pdf Quick Start Guide] {{•}} [ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/EdgeMarc/200/200AE2_HardwareInstallationGuide.pdf Hardware Installation Guide] *Invalid FCC ID: NKRCMA ([[Wistron NeWeb]]) *"A/N:GPCVA224A-000-VV311", "P/N:GVA224A Rev.VV" and :"START:2008/01/09" are silkscreened on base board. *"A/N:GPCVA224A-SOD-VV300, "P/N:GVA224A Rev.VV" and :"START:2007/09/17" are silkscreened on SLIC daughter board. Per the Ethernet OUI, this is a '''[[Runtop]]''' device. ===Overview=== *Integrated ADSL2+ DSL modem works with all ADSL providers :(''AT&T, Verizon, Centurylink, Qwest, Bell, Acanac, Teksavvy'') *Integrated 4 port managed Ethernet switch with VLAN support. *Integrated VoIP (SIP and H.323) FXS and FXO ports. *Management: HTTP, HTTPS, SSH, Telnet, SNMPv1 and V3. ===Models=== :;[[Edgewater]] *[[Edgewater Networks EdgeMarc 200AW]] *[[Edgewater Networks EdgeMarc 200AE2]] *[[Edgewater Networks EdgeMarc 250AE]] • [https://www.thetelecomspot.com/edgewater-networks-edgemarc-250w-2-port-enterprise-session-border-contoller-8-lanplus-1-wan-adsl-or-ethernet-plus-4-fxs-1-fxo-plus-802-11-wap-250w-100-0002.html ''EdgeMarc 200 Series'' spec.] :''EdgeMarc EM-250AE - 8-Port Enterprise Session Border Contoller'' :8x LAN, 1x WAN (ADSL or Ethernet), 4x FXS/1x FXO :;EdgeMarc 200 Series comparison {| class="wikitable sortable" cellpadding="3px" style="border: 1px solid black; border-spacing: 0px; width: 60%; text-align:center;" ! Model !! 200EW !! [[Edgewater Networks EdgeMarc 200AW|200AW]] !! 200AE1 !! [[Edgewater Networks EdgeMarc 200AE2|200AE2]] !! 250W |- ! WAN Port | 1x FE || 1x ADSL2+ || 1x ADSL2+,
1x FE || 1x ADSL2+,
1x FE || 1x ADSL2+,
1x GbE |- ! LAN Port | 4x FE || 4x FE || 4x FE || 4x FE || 8x GbE |- ! FXS Port | 2x || 2x || - || 2x || 4x |- ! FXO Port | 1x || 1x || - || 1x || 1x |- ! VLAN | 16x || 16x || 16x || 16x || 16x |- ! Wi-Fi | 802.11abg || 802.11abg || - || - || 802.11bgn |- ! Serial Port | 1x Male DB9 || 1x Male DB9 || 1x Male DB9 || 1x Male DB9 || - |- ! Power | 12V/3A || 12V/3A || 12V/3A || 12V/1.5A || 12V/3A |- ! Dimensions | 1.7"/6.3"/10.5" || 1.7"/6.3"/10.5" || 1.7"/6.3"/10.5" || 1.7"/6.3"/10.5" || 1.59"/7.1"/12" |- |} ==Images== https://abcconf.com/store/pc/catalog/ED-EM-200AE2-AE401_Detail.jpg File:Edgewater 200AE2 Internal.jpeg|Internal view File:Edgewater 200AE2 Main top.jpeg|Top of main board File:Edgewater 200AE2 Main bottom.jpeg|Bottom of main board File:Edgewater 200AE2 Phone Top.jpeg| Top of phone board File:Edgewater 200AE2 Phone bottom.jpeg| Bottom of phone board [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
